channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Android Lint Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Android Lint Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2262|2024-08-04T07:01:41.320Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20android%20lint%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Android Lint Plugin 2.6 and earlier does not escape the annotation message in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to provide report files to the plugin's post-build step.
